sub_domain: Factions & Organizations (Gu-pa Il-bang / The One Gang)

faction_profile.name: 개방 (Beggars' Sect / Gaebang / 丐幇)
alias: The Information Network of the World

location.base: Headquarters (Chong-ta) is mobile or hidden, but branches (Bun-ta) exist in every major city.

ideology.requirement: Must renounce all wealth upon entry. Total poverty.

structure.leader: Bangju (Sect Leader) - Wielder of the Dog Beating Staff.
structure.rank_system: Knots (Gyeol / 結) tied on the waist sash.

strengths: Information: With beggars in every street corner, nothing happens without them knowing.
Numbers: Largest membership in the Wulin (Human Wave tactics).
Unity: Bound by brotherhood and strict rules despite chaotic appearance.

customs.induction_ritual: Spitting Ritual (All members spit on the new leader to show equality and acceptance of filth).
customs.dress_code: Ragged clothes (patchwork), holding a bowl and a stick.

signature_weapon_art.name: 타구봉법 (Dog Beating Staff Technique / 打狗棒法)
signature_weapon_art.description: The supreme technique taught only to the Sect Leader. Uses a stick to strike 'dogs' (enemies).
forms: 반자결 (Binding Word Formula) - Entangling the enemy weapon.
signature_weapon_art.weapon: 타구봉 (Dog Beating Staff) - Usually made of green jade or dark iron. Symbol of authority.

signature_palm_art.name: 강룡십팔장 (Eighteen Dragon Subduing Palms / 降龍十八掌)
signature_palm_art.description: The pinnacle of external hard Yang arts. Overwhelming destructive power.
signature_palm_art.cons: Consumes massive internal energy. Hard to sustain for long battles.

formations.name: 타구진 (Dog Beating Formation / 打狗陣)
formations.tactics: Distracting with begging, singing, crying, and spitting while attacking from all angles. Looks messy but is highly calculated.

narrative_role: The 'News Channel' of the Wulin world.
The faction that provides a 'Drunken Master' or 'Eccentric Mentor' for the protagonist.
A moral compass that proves 'Clothes do not make the man'.
Rivals to the Haomun (Underworld) in information gathering.
